sentence.Network_en: For some inexplicable reason she was attracted to Patrick.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为某些无法解释的原因，她被帕特里克所吸引。

sentence.Network_en: His behaviour was extraordinary and inexplicable.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的行为不同寻常，让人费解。

sentence.Network_en: For some inexplicable reason he gave up a fantastic job.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于某种莫名其妙的原因，他放弃了一份很不错的工作。

UNIT 1. A Kind of Sermon_旺旺英语教学网 ... hopefully 怀着希望；但愿 inexplicable 无法说明的；费解的 refuge 避难；庇护.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... inertia 惰性；懒惰 inexplicable 无法解释的 infant 婴儿.
inexorable中文 ... inert a. 无活动能力的；惰性的 inexplicable a. 无法解释的，难以理解的... 劫匪 cateran.

list.abs: 悲哀的英文翻译，悲哀用英语怎么说 -... ... 感到悲哀 feel sad 莫名的悲哀 inexplicable sadness 神情悲哀 sad expression.
an inexplicable animus against intellectuals .对知识分子的莫名其妙的恶意
at this moment , the glass began to know the name of the original glass , and because she always so easily broken , always inexplicable to collapse .这时候，玻璃开始知道自己的名字原来是玻璃了，因为她总是那么容易破碎，总是莫名地垮塌。
I shivered involuntarily with inexplicable dread ., 我怀着莫名其妙的恐惧 , 身不由己地不寒而栗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, or from Latin inexplicabilis 'that cannot be unfolded', from in- 'not' + explicabilis (see explicable)

entry.def: If something is inexplicable, you cannot explain why it happens or why it is true.

example.ex: His behaviour was extraordinary and inexplicable...
example.tran: 他的行为不同寻常,让人费解。

example.ex: For some inexplicable reason, the investors decided to pull out.
example.tran: 由于某些无法说明的原因,投资商们决定撤出投资。

means.word_mean: 1. incapable of being explained or accounted for;

sentences.sentence: "left the house at three in the morning for inexplicable reasons"

auth_sentence.content: Inexplicable, because the book has no plot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inexplicable, because the book has no plot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inexplicable, because the book has no plot.

auth_sentence.content: His fury seemed...inexplicable, unwarranted by anything Henry had said.
auth_sentence.res_content: His fury seemed...inexplicable, unwarranted by anything Henry had said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His fury seemed...inexplicable, unwarranted by anything Henry had said.

auth_sentence.content: God being the inexplicable came a long way.
auth_sentence.res_content: God being the inexplicable came a long way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: God being the inexplicable came a long way.

sentences.en: This theory makes sense of an otherwise inexplicable phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 这种理论能说明这一其他理论无法解释的现象。
她的缺席无法解释, 令我担忧。
他们的举动完全令人摸不 头脑。
